_header: Youth ne can not but leaden me will
Subjects: ages of man’s life; sermons, verse in
_description: Youth and Age — three couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝungþe ne can nouth but leden me wilNe elde ne wilnouth
                    techen me skilBut sum time ȝingþe beginnet a playÞat
                    elde ne can nouth putten awayÞerfore as sone as men ben of ageWil
                    is a meister & skil but a page
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 12.
